description: Two walls playfully decide to meet at the corner.
title: Corner Meeting
n_1: Wall One stood tall, freshly painted and proud.
n_2: Wall Two gleamed in the sunlight, beaming back.
n_3: They shared a playful glance across the room.
n_4: Both walls, reaching the corner, chuckled at their clever rendezvous.
c1_4: Always a pleasure to corner the market with you!
